formatDescription: The SYLK (SYmbolic LinK) file format is a ASCII format used to exchange information between versions of Multiplan and spreadsheets such as Excel.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 11/2023 (v.115)- description updated, internal signature max offset values changed from null to 0 and EOF signature modified to accommodate for different operating systems. Submitted by Brigham Young University as part of PRONOM Research Week.

internalSignatures.name: Microsoft Symbolic Link (SYLK) File
internalSignatures.note: First Record type descriptor is ID;P<name>;  Last record is E
